com.netflix.nfgraph.util

Class ByteArrayBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nfgraph.util.ByteArrayBuffer

  • public class ByteArrayBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    A ByteArrayBuffer is used by the NFCompressedGraphBuilder to write data to a byte array.

    It is unlikely that this class will need to be used externally.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteArrayBuffer() 
      ByteArrayBuffer(int initialSize) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyTo(java.io.OutputStream os)
      Copies the written data to the given OutputStream
      byte[] getData() 
      int length()
      The current length of the written data, in bytes.
      void reset()
      Sets the length of the written data to 0.
      void write(byte[] data)
      Writes each byte of data, in order.
      void write(ByteArrayBuffer buf)
      Copies the contents of the specified buffer into this buffer at the current position.
      void writeByte(byte b)
      Writes a byte of data.
      void writeVInt(int value)
      Writes a variable-byte encoded integer to the byte array.

        Sets the length of the written data to 0.

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Returns:
        a byte array containing a copy of the written data. The length of the byte array will be exactly equal to the written data.

        Writes a byte of data.
